event.title: December 1942, British invasion of French Somaliland about 700 British troops and Free French troops occupied

data.event: In December 1942, British invasion of French Somaliland about 700 British troops and Free French troops occupied the town.

event.title: 1946, a new housing estate and hill station was built

data.event: Under French colonial rule in 1946, a new housing estate and hill station was built.

event.title: 2 May 2000, peace talks between various factions of the Somali Civil War were held

data.event: From 2 May 2000, peace talks between various factions of the Somali Civil War were held in the city with some 810 delegates, resulting in the establishment of the Transitional National Government of Somalia.
